Once upon a time, in a quaint village, there stood a peculiar house that walked. Each morning, it would shuffle to a new spot, its wooden legs creaking softly. The villagers marveled, whispering tales of its origins. Some believed it was enchanted, while others thought it was a prank. One day, a curious girl named Elara decided to follow the house. It led her to a hidden glade filled with vibrant flowers and sparkling streams. There, she discovered the house was searching for a place to plant its roots. With a gentle touch, Elara promised to care for it, and together they flourished.
